poem_en: It was a troubling time for a troubling line, so he wrote as he went and counted in time, typing to the beat and carving out rhymes. And as he meandered through his mind, he found but a gem of a thought. It didn't make sense, for it was and was not Schrodinger's memory.
poem_it: Era un momento difficile per un verso difficile, così scriveva mentre andava e contava nel tempo, battendo i tasti e intagliando rime. E mentre vagava per la sua mente, trovò solo un gioiello di pensiero. Non aveva senso, perché era e non era il ricordo di Schrodinger.
